_header: Thus it is said in prophecy
_description: James Ryman, a Nativity carol — six 5-line stanzas (aaaab) including refrain, ‘Now in this fest this holy fest’ and 4-line burden (bbbb): ‘Now in this fest this holy fest / Nunc puer nobis natus est (repeated) / Et puer nobis datus est’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Thus it is seide in prophecyeI take witnesse of
                    ysay…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And alle our care and woo to ceaseOure Ioy & myrth forto
                    increaseNow in this fest this holy fest
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 203-4.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 43-4; 1977, 36.
